name: Salome's Kiss (itch)
description:
• A kinetic story with no choices/branches
  • Detailed character and background artwork
  • A custom OST
  • A dramatic gothic romance story
  • Suffering


Writing/programming: ebi-hime
Sprite/CG art: RockCR
Background art: Lim Chin Yang
UI: Kathaeris
Music: Hope
Opening video: Phinalgo
Chinese translation: Yuri atelier

Note: The adult patch can be downloaded (for free) on its own here, if you can't access the adult patch on Steam for whatever reason.
Drop the adult.rpa in Salome's 'game folder, overwriting the prexisting adult.rpa file, and you're good to go!
